verses.verse: שׁוֹטְט֞וּ <S%H7751><s%> shot-Tu Run ye to and fro בְּחוּצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> be-chu-Tzot through the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וּרְאוּ־ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'u- and see נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now וּדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> u-de-'U now and know וּבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> u-vak-Shu and seek בִרְחוֹבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H7339><s%> vir-choo-Tei-ha, in the broad places אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If תִּמְצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> tim-tze-'U thereof if ye can find אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, a man אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יֵ֛שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh if there be עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh [any] that executeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat judgment מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh that seeketh אֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-Nah; the truth וְאֶסְלַ֖ח <S%H5545><s%> ve-'es-Lach and I will pardon לָֽהּ׃ Lah.

וְאִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im and although חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> yo-Me-ru; And though they say לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen after that לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lash-She-ker falsely יִשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> yish-sha-Ve-'u. surely they swear

יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD עֵינֶיךָ֮ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Cha [are] not thine eyes הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not לֶאֱמוּנָה֒ <S%H530><s%> le-'e-mu-Nah faithfulness הִכִּ֤יתָה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ki-tah beat אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- have not חָ֔לוּ <S%H2342><s%> Cha-lu, them but they have not grieved כִּלִּיתָ֕ם <S%H3615><s%> kil-li-Tam thou hast consumed מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu them [but] they have refused קַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> Ka-chat to receive מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar; correction חִזְּק֤וּ <S%H2388><s%> chiz-ze-Ku harder פְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei-Hem they have made their faces מִסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> mis-Se-la', than a rock מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu they have refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv. to return

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, Therefore I said אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- are only דַּלִּ֖ים <S%H1800><s%> dal-Lim Surely these [are] poor הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; They נוֹאֲל֕וּ <S%H2973><s%> no-'a-Lu they are foolish כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U for they know דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech not the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat [nor] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. of their God

אֵֽלֲכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-la-chah- will go לִּ֤י li אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַגְּדֹלִים֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim me unto the great men וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <S%H1696><s%> va-'a-dab-be-Rah and will speak אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, they יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U unto them for they have known דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat [and] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; of their God אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach also הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah with יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav but these have altogether שָׁ֣בְרוּ <S%H7665><s%> Sha-ve-ru broken עֹ֔ל <S%H5923><s%> 'Ol, the yoke נִתְּק֖וּ <S%H5423><s%> nit-te-Ku [and] burst מוֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4147><s%> mo-se-Rot. the bonds

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that הִכָּ֨ם <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kam shall slay אַרְיֵ֜ה <S%H738><s%> 'ar-Yeh Wherefore a lion מִיַּ֗עַר <S%H3293><s%> mi-Ya-'ar, out of the forest זְאֵ֤ב <S%H2061><s%> ze-'Ev them [and] a wolf עֲרָבוֹת֙ <S%H6160><s%> a-ra-Vot of the evenings יְשָׁדְדֵ֔ם <S%H7703><s%> ye-sha-de-Dem, shall spoil נָמֵ֤ר <S%H5246><s%> na-Mer them a leopard שֹׁקֵד֙ <S%H8245><s%> sho-Ked shall watch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> 'a-rei-Hem, over their cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Everyone הַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tze every one that goeth out מֵהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> me-Hen-nah thence shall יִטָּרֵ֑ף <S%H2963><s%> yit-ta-Ref; be torn in pieces כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because רַבּוּ֙ <S%H7231><s%> rab-Bu are many פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> pish-'ei-Hem, because their transgressions עָצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> 'a-tze-Mu are increased; מְשֻׁבֹותֵיהֶם me-shu-vo-tei-hem כמְשׁוּבֹותֵיהֶֽם <S%H4878><s%> me-shu-vo-tei-Hem backsliding ק

אֵ֤י <S%H335><s%> 'ei How לָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> la-zoT likewise; אֶסְלֹוחַ־ 'es-lo-ach- כאֶֽסְלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> 'es-lach- pardon לָ֔ךְ <S%H5545><s%> Lach, shall I pardon קבָּנַ֣יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Na-yich your sons עֲזָב֔וּנִי <S%H5800><s%> 'a-za-Vu-ni, have forsaken וַיִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-ve-'U me and sworn בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> be-Lo by [them that are] no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; gods וָאַשְׂבִּ֤עַ <S%H7650><s%> va-'as-Bi-a' when I had fed them to the full אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam וַיִּנְאָ֔פוּ <S%H5003><s%> vai-yin-'A-fu, they then committed adultery וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit houses זוֹנָ֖ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah in the harlots' יִתְגֹּדָֽדוּ׃ <S%H1413><s%> yit-go-Da-du. and assembled themselves by troops

סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses מְיֻזָּנִ֖ים <S%H2109><s%> me-yuz-za-Nim They were [as] fed מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <S%H7904><s%> mash-Kim in the morning הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu; become אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- after אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu after his neighbour's יִצְהָֽלוּ׃ <S%H6670><s%> yitz-Ha-lu. neighed

הַֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ha-'al- and אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these לוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אֶפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> 'ef-Kod Shall I not visit נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- for these [things];saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im and on בְּג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> be-Goy on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- such כָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> ka-Zeh, this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> tit-nak-Kem be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. and shall not my soul ס sa-Mek

עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu Go ye up בְשָׁרוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8284><s%> ve-sha-ro-Tei-ha upon her walls וְשַׁחֵ֔תוּ <S%H7843><s%> ve-sha-Che-tu, and destroy וְכָלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> ve-cha-Lah not a full end אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; but make הָסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> ha-Si-ru take away נְטִ֣ישׁוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5189><s%> ne-Ti-sho-Tei-ha, her battlements כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> Lo are not לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for they [are] not the LORD'S הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

כִּֽחֲשׁוּ֙ <S%H3584><s%> ki-cha-Shu They have belied בַּיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will not תָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo come עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, [It is] not he neither shall evil וְחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev sword וְרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ve-ra-'Av nor famine ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> Lo and we will not נִרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Eh. upon us neither shall we see
